ratings.comment: Professor Judge is awesome! He is engaging during class, has fair grading, and gives an average amount of assignments. All our quizzes were online and were open note, so they were pretty easy. Prof Judge is really nice and wants people to grasp the content. Highly recommend!!

I loved professor Judge. He is knowledgeable about everything marketing-related and a great resource outside of class. Some negatives about him are that his grading can sometimes be random and can take off points randomly. He sometimes goes on tangents during long lectures, so it's easy to zone out. Overall, loved having him, and it was an easy A

Mike was overall a great professor. His grading for participation doesn't make a ton of sense since he doesn't give out 100% even if you talk in almost every class. His quizzes are sometimes a bit tricky, but overall his class was super interesting and easy for a non-MKT major!
One of the best professors I've had from the marketing department! Super friendly and passionate about marketing which makes the class more interesting!

Consumer Behavior is a topic I really enjoy and Mike did a great job teaching it! He treats his classroom like a business setting, which was a nice change of pace from normal classes. He says that you need to buy the textbook, I did not. I instead saved $150+ on the book and got those 2-3 textbook questions wrong on the exams. Worth it!

I am a marketing major, so I am required to take Marketing 305, but I loved Professor Judge. He is really funny and cares about his students. If you took Marketing 300, the first part of the class content is very similar. 3 exams, and a group project. Would definitely recommend taking a class with him!
